body:
Hello Mostapha.

I just write in Gthub. here can send you my grasshopper definition.





I am having some issues with me definition. i want to simulate the CIE CLOUDY of 10000LUX. but when a place the geometry. i am having problems with the colors and the data that is simulate

replies.body:
Hi Starsk, I'm not sure if I can understand what is exactly the problem but from the image my understanding is that you want to control the colors for the presentation. If that is right then setting up lowBand and highBand will do it for you: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/JH0C62scBfABnY8RwqV1CBp1HvEO-VTPp6YhKh2yAOoA7kDNYnHhISmcriGUitxrGS2vn7I8rRN*8lIg2ITB8098JZpNoGb8/legendParMinMax.png)
I attached the updated gh definition and updated some of the components. Cheers, Mostapha
